title: Clarins Wonder Perfect Mascara
description: This multi-dimensional 3-in-1 mascara coats lashes from roots to tip, delivering maximum length, curl and volume! Lashes look incredibly glamorous with intense colour and long-lasting hold. Thanks to the Wonder-Perfect Complex, you will experience visibly fuller, longer, curled and intensely colored lashes after just one application.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE DRAMA
description:
Let your eyelashes take center stage with Lancôme’s full volume mascara, Hypnôse Drama.Volume in a single step. Our curvaceous super-sized brush for full lash contact creates high volume and thicker looking lashes. With every stroke our glossy mascara builds a stunning gaze, for beautiful, full body lashes.

Benefits:
Extreme volume, fuller looking lashes, curves

Application
Place curved side of brush at the root of your lashes, gently comb from the root to the tip with a zigzag motion. Turn brush and use bristle tips to structure, separate and enhance the appearance of lashes.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE DRAMA WATERPROOF
description:
Hypnôse Drama Waterproof combines the high impact volume of Hypnôse Drama with the benefit of being waterproof.
You won’t believe your eyes.
The generous Convex brush gives full lash contact for a full impact volume look. A waterproof formula with up to 24 hour hold and a irresistibly volumised look. Place the flat curved slide of the brush on the lash fringe. Let the brush glide on lashes from root to tip with a zig zag movement. Turn the brush and use the side bristles to structure your gaze. Continue the application with the side bristles for further separation and volume.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE DOLL EYES
description:
Watch lashes turn into a doll-eyed look with Lancôme’s Hypnôse Doll Eyes. Evenly coats lashes without weighing them down. A must-have mascara to create beautiful lashes that look extended and lifted. Sweep on using our cone shaped brush and watch your eyes transform into a dazzling wide-eyed look.

Benefits
Extended and lifted lash look, wide eyed look, doll eyes effect

Application
Our unique cone shaped brush ensures the ideal load with each application, even in the inner corner of the eyes. Apply your mascara from the base of your lashes working through to the tips, in zigzag movements, for maximum coverage.

description: In one simple step, this soothing cleanser creates the sensation of water-fresh cleansing — without the water. Moringa Seed extract gently rinses-away impurities and light make-up with a fresh, non-foaming action. title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE STAR WATERPROOF
description:
Ultra-Glam Volume & Curve. Waterproof.
The Star eye-look by Lancôme. Create show-stopping eyes with our mascara and dual-sided brush, leaving lashes looking volumised and curled. A “Black Diamond” shade dresses lashes in a deep and glamorous intensity.
24 hours Wear*. *Instrumental test

Application
Start the mascara application by gently pressing the flat part of the brush onto the roots of the upper lashes, to release some product and define the eyes.
Then turn the brush to use the side with longer bristles and then glide it from the roots to the tips in a zigzag movement to ensure the texture is spread evenly. Use as much mascara as is needed to thicken and taper the lashes.

title: LANCOME CONCEALER TEINT MIRACLE PEN
description:
For instantly easy touch-ups: your foundation-on-the-go. Enriched with Teint Miracle foundation technology.
Illuminates, covers and reduces the appearance of dark circles and imperfections. Blends seamlessly. Non-greasy texture.

Use this corrector in 3 ways.
1 - To enhance your make-up look, apply Teint Miracle Concealer Pen under the eyes using the fingertips and blend from the inner corner of the eye, working towards the outer corner.
2 - Apply it around the nose to conceal redness.
3 - Apply it around the mouth for increased lip contour definition

title: LANCOME ROUGE IN LOVE 6H
description:
Rouge in Love Key Features
Come out and play with Lancôme’s gorgeously hydrating lipstick, Rouge in Love.
Combine vibrant colour with a feather-light texture that lasts up to 6 hours. Choose from 24 colours to achieve a look you love – from natural to sophisticated. Let your lipcolour show your mood.

Benefits : 6 hour wear, featherlight texture, vibrant colour

How to apply Rouge in Love
We recommend using a lip brush for precise and even coverage. Apply your choice of Rouge in love, then blot your lips with a tissue to remove excess colour.

title: LANCOME LIP GLOSS JUICY TUBES
description:
This ultra-brilliant, flavoured gloss slicks on easily, thanks to its handy tube-tip applicator. Totally transparent shine, plus a hint of shimmering colour makes lips glisten for a glamorous lacquered effect

Colours and effects to satisfy every mood. A range of sorbet colours in a fragranced, gel texture which are either totally transparent or shimmering for lips that glisten.
Fun, fruity flavours complement each shade. Totally tangy and seductively sweet, you’ll be tempted to try them all!

description:
6 times more pigment than a traditional lip gloss
Intense and pure colour, long lasting, comfortable, easy to apply.

Benefits
Hydratation, comfort, 8 hour wear, long lasting

Place the applicator at the centre of the upper lip and glide towards one corner of the mouth and then the other. Repeat on the lower lip. Use with the pencil if your choice.

title: LANCOME GLOSS IN LOVE
description:
Gloss In Love key features
Make heads turn with Lancôme’s extreme shine lip gloss, Gloss In Love.

Our moisturising lip gloss envelops lips in a brilliant high-shine, while our innovative double-sided applicator provides customisable coverage. Our unique curved Lip Shaper coats the lower lip while the pointed Lip Liner precisely defines the upper lip for a sophisticated look. Choose from 12 instantly addictive shades to create your own shimmering, show-stopping lip effects.

Benefits: 6 hours of moisture. Intense shine, sparkling, shimmering lips.

How to apply Gloss In Love
Use the curved Lip Shaper side of the applicator to coat the lower lip.
Use the pointed Lip Liner side of the applicator to help define the upper lip.

title: LANCOME LIP LINER CONTOUR PRO
description:
This innovative, dual-purpose lip lining pencil lets you outline, emphasise or redefine the shape of your lips easily and precisely. The waterproof formula delivers a long-lasting, matte result that can be worn alone, or with your favourite lipstick or gloss. Prevents feathering to help your lip colour lasts longer.

Its revolutionary texture glides on smoothly for precise and even outlining.
Contour Pro goes on and stays on for amazing lip colour that won't slip or slide.

title: LANCOME VERNIS IN LOVE
description:
Add a colour twist to your nails with Lancôme’s gorgeous range of nail polishes, Vernis in Love.Available in 24 bold and pastel shades, this glossy nail varnish is the perfect addition to any look. Paint your favourite colour on and enjoy fast, even coverage. Get perfect nail colour application in the blink of an eye!

Benefits:High shine finish, easy application

Application

Create Lancôme’s French Love Manicure with Vernis in Love. Apply a layer of your favourite colour to the plate of your nail. Leave until dry, then apply a complementary shade onto the tips.

title: LANCOME FOUNDATION TEINT VISIONNAIRE SPF 20
description:
What if a foundation could transform your skin in 4 weeks?
Two simple steps to correct dark spots, pores, and fine lines.
Step 1: Skin Correcting Foundation (SPF 20) naturally evens out the complexion flawlessly and visibly improves pores and fine lines day after day.The foundation is concentrated in LR 2412, the active ingredient in Visionnaire serum.
Step 2: Precision Spot Corrector: visibly corrects spots, dark circles and all types of imperfections.

title: LANCOME FOUNDATION TEINT IDOLE ULTRA 24H SPF 15
description:
"Teint Idole Ultra 24H Key Features

Discover a foundation that lasts all day with Lancôme’s Teint Idole Ultra 24H.

Our first 24 hour* liquid foundation gives you an even, flawless looking complexion. No need for touch ups. With a blendable fresh texture and a smooth finish. This long-lasting foundation provides the perfect coverage. Available in 22 shades.
*Self-assessment by 109 women.

Benefits : long lasting wear, flawless complexion

How to apply Teint Idole Ultra 24H
Dab a small amount of Teint Idole Ultra 24H to well-moisturised skin, starting on your T-zone, then moving to your forehead, sides of the nose, cheeks and chin. Using a foundation brush or your fingertips, blend the foundation out towards your hair and jaw line to achieve a natural, flawless look. "

title: LANCOME FOUNDATION PHOTOGENIC LUMESSENCE SPF 15
description: Master the power of light and reveal a flawless, photo-finished complexion that's aglow with youthful radiance. This fluid foundation visibly smoothes away fine lines, pores and imperfections in a flash, thanks to Lancôme’s breakthrough Photonic Network™--a combination of coated pigments and micro-pearls that enhance luminosity, so you look lovely in any lighting. And the ultra-hydrating formula locks in moisture for up to 24 hours, for skin that feels soft and supple all day. Moderate to full coverage.

title: LANCOME MIRACLE COMPACT POWDER TEINT SPF 15
description:
Teint Miracle Compact Key Feature
Reveal a matte, even complexion with Lancôme's Teint Miracle Compact powder foundation.

Teint Miracle Compact from Lancôme is the ideal compact foundation makeup to even skin tone and create a natural look. Its anti-shine formula instantly enhances the complexion. Wet or dry application blends evenly for a natural effect that helps conceal imperfections and leaves complexion looking smooth and even. You get perfect wear-ability in a face makeup that feels comfortable all day long.
How to apply Teint Miracle Compact
Apply with a brush to set the foundation and conceal imperfections. Sweep from the inside of the face outward. Apply dry for a natural finish, or wet for a more sophisticated look.

title: LANCOME TEINT IDOLE COMPACT POWDER
description:
Retouch-free - shine control

Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra 24h Compact Powder foundation contains a unique concentration of Perlite - an ingredient renowned for its high sebum absorption capacity, which builds a true "isolating barrier" against shininess.

Benefits of the Lancôme Teint Idole Ultra 24h Compact Powder:
- All-day mattifying 
- Longwear
- Skin balance 
- Available in multiple shades 

Directions: Even out the look of your complexion by sweeping the sponge upwards over your forehead, cheekbones and chin.

description:
INTENSE STROBING HIGHLIGHTER - ILLUMINATED DEWY GLOW

Lancôme’s all over highlighter and radiance booster. 

At the heart of the formula, the "liquid mirror" like particles, help create a highlighted radiance boost on the skin, whilst avoiding a shiny skin effect.

Complexion is flawlessly illuminated. Intensely hydrated with a light, non-greasy finish.

STEP 1: Apply in small touches alone or on top of foundation.
STEP 2: For a more contoured effect highlight specific areas of the face (cheekbones, browbone, cupid bow, centre of the nose and chin)

description:

All skin types, even sensitive eyes and contact lense wearers.
Wipe off.

title: LANCOME EXFOLIANCE CLARTE
description:
Brighten your skin's appearance with this refreshing gel formula for normal and combination skin. Formulated with white wax micro-beads, ultra-fine exfoliating grains and a cocktail of Pineapple and Papaya extracts. Exfoliance Clarté gently sloughs off dull skin layers and removes impurities. Leaves the skin feeling clean, smooth and toned for a radiant complexion.

Normal and combination skin types.
Rinse off.
Use once or twice a week, as needed.

Application:
Apply Exfoliance Clarté on moistened face and neck. Massage product into the skin using circular movements, avoiding the eye area.
Rinse carefully with lukewarm water.

title: LANCOME FOUNDATION TEINT MIRACLE SPF 15
description:
Lancôme science discovers the inner light of perfect skin and recreates it.

Pioneer Discovery

Light is not only reflected on the surface it is also naturally re-emitted from deep within the skin. This is skin's inner light.  At its peak, this surface radiance (1) and inner light (3) constitute skin's aura.
When visible light reaches skin, it begins a real journey:

    5% of light is reflected: this is skin's surface radiance (1)
    95% penetrates skin and interacts with the epidermis and dermis.  55% is absorbed (2) and 40% is re-emitted at the surface (3) this is skin's inner light.
Aura-Inside (TM) Technology
A Lancôme exclusive which associates:
A new generation of bioptic pigments combined with classic mineral pigments.  Together, they reproduce the appearance of inner light of perfect skin, by recreating the intensity and pristine freshness of its radiance. 
    A unique liquid light essence maximizes skin's surface radiance.

title: LANCOME FOUNDATION TEINT IDOLE ULTRA 24H SPF 15
description:
"Teint Idole Ultra 24H Key Features

Discover a foundation that lasts all day with Lancôme’s Teint Idole Ultra 24H.

Our first 24 hour* liquid foundation gives you an even, flawless looking complexion. No need for touch ups. With a blendable fresh texture and a smooth finish. This long-lasting foundation provides the perfect coverage. Available in 22 shades.
*Self-assessment by 109 women.

Benefits : long lasting wear, flawless complexion

How to apply Teint Idole Ultra 24H
Dab a small amount of Teint Idole Ultra 24H to well-moisturised skin, starting on your T-zone, then moving to your forehead, sides of the nose, cheeks and chin. Using a foundation brush or your fingertips, blend the foundation out towards your hair and jaw line to achieve a natural, flawless look. "

description:
For instantly easy touch-ups: your foundation-on-the-go. Enriched with Teint Miracle foundation technology.
Illuminates, covers and reduces the appearance of dark circles and imperfections. Blends seamlessly. Non-greasy texture.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE STAR
description:
Hypnôse Star Key Features
Create voluminous, show-stopping eyes with Lancôme's curl-enhancing Hypnôse Star mascara.

Our unique dual-sided brush enhances lash volume while a “Black Diamond” shade dresses lashes in a deep and glamorous intensity. Eyelashes are enhanced from the ends to the tips, revealing a fuller, dramatic eye makeup look.

Benefits:
Fuller, longer, thicker-looking lashes, intensely rich coverage, curl-enhancing, volumising effect, dramatic eye makeup

How to apply Hypnôse Star
Gently press the flat part of the brush onto the roots of the upper lashes.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE STAR WATERPROOF
description:
Ultra-Glam Volume & Curve. Waterproof.
The Star eye-look by Lancôme. Create show-stopping eyes with our mascara and dual-sided brush, leaving lashes looking volumised and curled. A “Black Diamond” shade dresses lashes in a deep and glamorous intensity.
24 hours Wear*. *Instrumental test

Application
Start the mascara application by gently pressing the flat part of the brush onto the roots of the upper lashes, to release some product and define the eyes.
Then turn the brush to use the side with longer bristles and then glide it from the roots to the tips in a zigzag movement to ensure the texture is spread evenly. Use as much mascara as is needed to thicken and taper the lashes.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE DRAMA
description:
Let your eyelashes take center stage with Lancôme’s full volume mascara, Hypnôse Drama.Volume in a single step. Our curvaceous super-sized brush for full lash contact creates high volume and thicker looking lashes. With every stroke our glossy mascara builds a stunning gaze, for beautiful, full body lashes.

Benefits:
Extreme volume, fuller looking lashes, curves

Application
Place curved side of brush at the root of your lashes, gently comb from the root to the tip with a zigzag motion. Turn brush and use bristle tips to structure, separate and enhance the appearance of lashes.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE DRAMA WATERPROOF
description:
Hypnôse Drama Waterproof combines the high impact volume of Hypnôse Drama with the benefit of being waterproof.
You won’t believe your eyes.
The generous Convex brush gives full lash contact for a full impact volume look. A waterproof formula with up to 24 hour hold and a irresistibly volumised look. Place the flat curved slide of the brush on the lash fringe. Let the brush glide on lashes from root to tip with a zig zag movement. Turn the brush and use the side bristles to structure your gaze. Continue the application with the side bristles for further separation and volume.

title: LANCOME MASCARA HYPNOSE DOLL EYES
description:
Watch lashes turn into a doll-eyed look with Lancôme’s Hypnôse Doll Eyes. Evenly coats lashes without weighing them down. A must-have mascara to create beautiful lashes that look extended and lifted. Sweep on using our cone shaped brush and watch your eyes transform into a dazzling wide-eyed look.

Benefits
Extended and lifted lash look, wide eyed look, doll eyes effect

Application
Our unique cone shaped brush ensures the ideal load with each application, even in the inner corner of the eyes. Apply your mascara from the base of your lashes working through to the tips, in zigzag movements, for maximum coverage.

title: LANCOME MASCARA DEFINICILS
description:
"Définicils Key Features
Lancôme’s favourite Définicils mascara provides lash separation. The exclusive eye makeup formula shapes and defines to create longer looking, beautiful lashes from base to tip without clumping.

The grooved bristles on the patented brush evenly distribute mascara along the entire lash from root to tip. Separates the look of eye lashes for a natural-looking, even finish every time.


How to apply Définicils
Apply mascara from the base of the lashes to the tips using zigzag movements.

When you apply mascara this way, you will be able to direct and perfectly distribute the texture of mascara onto the lashes. Apply mascara from the base of lashes to the tips using zigzag movements."

metaKeyword:

From all natural daytime looks to seductive smoky eyes for night, use Lancôme Ombre Hypnôse for intense, show-stopping eyes!

Whether you choose to look delicate with a sheer wash of colour, or decide on a daring and dramatic look with intense coverage, the crease resistant eye makeup formula delivers smooth, even, buildable coverage every time.

Intense pigments, smooth, natural everyday eye makeup looks, buildable coverage

To create a natural look with wide eyes, apply Ombre Hypnôse eye shadow across the eyelids and/or on the brow bone. Highlight the arch or the eyebrow with a brighter colour eye shadow to create a fresh eye touch.
"

title: LANCOME ART LINER
description:
Create impactful eyes with Artliner 24H bold liquid eyeliner from Lancôme.

Lancôme’s Artliner 24H waterproof eyeliner contains a patented, precision felt tip applicator that enables you to achieve your desired look effortlessly. From a sultry, sophisticated black line to a daring multi-hued effect, colour stays put and looks vibrant 24 hours a day.

Waterproof. Smudgeproof.

Benefits
Sultry eyes, cat eyes, waterproof, precision eye liner, 24 hour wear

How to apply Artliner 24H
Shake well before use.
For a precise line, apply the eyeliner by placing the tip of the Artliner 24H at the center of the lash line and line the eye toward the outermost lash. Finish and correct with a second stroke, if needed. Next, trace a finer line from the inner corner of the eye to the center, joining it seamlessly with your first stroke.

title: LANCOME LABSOLU ROUGE
description:
L'Absolu Rouge Key Features
Make a statement with L’Absolu Rouge, the symbol of eternal femininity.

Enriched with Lancôme's unique replenishing molecule Pro-Xylane™, this pampering lip colour creates visibly fuller and smoother lips. Available in 31 rich, voluptuous shades. With 8 hours of hydrating wear, this is the perfect lipstick to reshape, define and complete your luxurious look.

How to apply L'Absolu Rouge
Select your choice of L'Absolu Rouge lip shade. Work the lipstick on the back of the hand. Apply lipstick by dabbing it onto lips with your ring finger.

title: LANCOME FOUNDATION TEINT MIRACLE SPF 15
description:
Lancôme science discovers the inner light of perfect skin and recreates it.

Pioneer Discovery

Light is not only reflected on the surface it is also naturally re-emitted from deep within the skin. This is skin's inner light.  At its peak, this surface radiance (1) and inner light (3) constitute skin's aura.
When visible light reaches skin, it begins a real journey:

    5% of light is reflected: this is skin's surface radiance (1)
    95% penetrates skin and interacts with the epidermis and dermis.  55% is absorbed (2) and 40% is re-emitted at the surface (3) this is skin's inner light.
Aura-Inside (TM) Technology
A Lancôme exclusive which associates:
A new generation of bioptic pigments combined with classic mineral pigments.  Together, they reproduce the appearance of inner light of perfect skin, by recreating the intensity and pristine freshness of its radiance. 
    A unique liquid light essence maximizes skin's surface radiance.

Use along the lash line, above or below the eyes as desired. Use freshly sharpened for a precise line, or blend with a Lancôme eyeshadow brush to create a seductive smokey-eye look.

title: LANCOME ART LINER
description:
Create impactful eyes with Artliner 24H bold liquid eyeliner from Lancôme.

Lancôme’s Artliner 24H waterproof eyeliner contains a patented, precision felt tip applicator that enables you to achieve your desired look effortlessly. From a sultry, sophisticated black line to a daring multi-hued effect, colour stays put and looks vibrant 24 hours a day.

Waterproof. Smudgeproof.

Benefits
Sultry eyes, cat eyes, waterproof, precision eye liner, 24 hour wear

How to apply Artliner 24H
Shake well before use.
For a precise line, apply the eyeliner by placing the tip of the Artliner 24H at the center of the lash line and line the eye toward the outermost lash. Finish and correct with a second stroke, if needed. Next, trace a finer line from the inner corner of the eye to the center, joining it seamlessly with your first stroke.

description: Beautify your brows with Lancôme's Le Crayon Sourcils. The pencil is dual-use, with colour at one end and a eyebrow brush at the other, to ensure your brows stay beautiful looking.

title: LANCOME LABSOLU ROUGE
description:
L'Absolu Rouge Key Features
Make a statement with L’Absolu Rouge, the symbol of eternal femininity.

Enriched with Lancôme's unique replenishing molecule Pro-Xylane™, this pampering lip colour creates visibly fuller and smoother lips. Available in 31 rich, voluptuous shades. With 8 hours of hydrating wear, this is the perfect lipstick to reshape, define and complete your luxurious look.

Benefits : 8 hour hydration, smoother and fuller lips

How to apply L'Absolu Rouge
Select your choice of L'Absolu Rouge lip shade. Work the lipstick on the back of the hand. Apply lipstick by dabbing it onto lips with your ring finger.

title: LANCOME ROUGE IN LOVE 6H
description:
Rouge in Love Key Features
Come out and play with Lancôme’s gorgeously hydrating lipstick, Rouge in Love.
Combine vibrant colour with a feather-light texture that lasts up to 6 hours. Choose from 24 colours to achieve a look you love – from natural to sophisticated. Let your lipcolour show your mood.

Benefits : 6 hour wear, featherlight texture, vibrant colour

How to apply Rouge in Love
We recommend using a lip brush for precise and even coverage. Apply your choice of Rouge in love, then blot your lips with a tissue to remove excess colour.

title: LANCOME LIP GLOSS JUICY TUBES
description:
This ultra-brilliant, flavoured gloss slicks on easily, thanks to its handy tube-tip applicator. Totally transparent shine, plus a hint of shimmering colour makes lips glisten for a glamorous lacquered effect

Colours and effects to satisfy every mood. A range of sorbet colours in a fragranced, gel texture which are either totally transparent or shimmering for lips that glisten.
Fun, fruity flavours complement each shade. Totally tangy and seductively sweet, you’ll be tempted to try them all!

description:
6 times more pigment than a traditional lip gloss
Intense and pure colour, long lasting, comfortable, easy to apply.

Benefits
Hydratation, comfort, 8 hour wear, long lasting

How to apply L'Absolu Velours
Place the applicator at the centre of the upper lip and glide towards one corner of the mouth and then the other. Repeat on the lower lip. Use with the pencil if your choice.

title: LANCOME GLOSS IN LOVE
description:
Gloss In Love key features
Make heads turn with Lancôme’s extreme shine lip gloss, Gloss In Love.

Our moisturising lip gloss envelops lips in a brilliant high-shine, while our innovative double-sided applicator provides customisable coverage. Our unique curved Lip Shaper coats the lower lip while the pointed Lip Liner precisely defines the upper lip for a sophisticated look. Choose from 12 instantly addictive shades to create your own shimmering, show-stopping lip effects.

Benefits: 6 hours of moisture. Intense shine, sparkling, shimmering lips.

How to apply Gloss In Love
Use the curved Lip Shaper side of the applicator to coat the lower lip.
Use the pointed Lip Liner side of the applicator to help define the upper lip.

title: LANCOME LIP LINER CONTOUR PRO
description:
This innovative, dual-purpose lip lining pencil lets you outline, emphasise or redefine the shape of your lips easily and precisely. The waterproof formula delivers a long-lasting, matte result that can be worn alone, or with your favourite lipstick or gloss. Prevents feathering to help your lip colour lasts longer.

Its revolutionary texture glides on smoothly for precise and even outlining.
Contour Pro goes on and stays on for amazing lip colour that won't slip or slide.

title: LANCOME VERNIS IN LOVE
description:
Add a colour twist to your nails with Lancôme’s gorgeous range of nail polishes, Vernis in Love.Available in 24 bold and pastel shades, this glossy nail varnish is the perfect addition to any look. Paint your favourite colour on and enjoy fast, even coverage. Get perfect nail colour application in the blink of an eye!

Benefits:High shine finish, easy application

Application

Create Lancôme’s French Love Manicure with Vernis in Love. Apply a layer of your favourite colour to the plate of your nail. Leave until dry, then apply a complementary shade onto the tips.
